languages.text: {n}Кибелла вздергивает подбородок.{/n} "Понять... меня? Зачем, Домин'{name}? Моя участь предопределена, роли назначены, каждому из нас должно служить Неумирающему как предназначено..." {n}Кибелла колеблется. На секунду ее бровь изгибается в заломе.{/n} "Впрочем, если ты действительно желаешь знать..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла вздергивает подбородок.{/n} "Зачем, Эним'{name}? Твое желание странно, но, если ты жаждешь познать..."

languages.text: {n}She raises her chin.{/n} "Understand... me? Why, Domin'{name}? My fate is preordained, and our places assigned. We both must serve the Undying One as His design foretells." {n}Kibellah hesitates. You see her eyebrow creeping upward before quickly straightening once more.{/n} "But if such is indeed your wish..."

languages.text: {n}Alza la barbilla.{/n} «¿Entenderme... a mí? ¿Por qué, Domin'{name}? Mi destino está escrito y nuestros lugares están ya asignados. Amb{mf|o|a}s debemos servir al Inmortal tal y como indica Su designio». {n}Kibellah titubea. Puedes ver que sus cejas se levantan ligeramente antes de recuperar su posición habitual.{/n} «Pero si tal es su deseo...».
languages.original_text: {n}She raises her chin.{/n} "Understand... me? Why, Domin'{name}? My fate is preordained, and our places assigned. We both must serve the Undying One as His design foretells." {n}Kibellah hesitates. You see her eyebrow creeping upward before quickly straightening once more.{/n} "But if such is indeed your wish..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alza la barbilla.{/n} «¿Entenderme... a mí? ¿Por qué, Domin'{name}? Mi destino está escrito y nuestros lugares están ya asignados. Amb{mf|o|a}s debemos servir al Inmortal tal y como indica Su designio». {n}Kibellah titubea. Puedes ver que sus cejas se levantan ligeramente antes de recuperar su posición habitual.{/n} «Pero si tal es su deseo...».

languages.text: {n}彼女は顎を上げる。{/n}「私を…理解する？どうして、ドミン・{name}？私の運命は初めから決まっている。私たちは、共に不死の者の思し召しに従い、主に仕えなければならない」{n}キベラは逡巡している。彼女は眉を寄せるが、すぐにまた元に戻す。{/n}「でも、それが本当にあなたの望みだというのなら…」
languages.original_text: {n}She raises her chin.{/n} "Understand... me? Why, Domin'{name}? My fate is preordained, and our places assigned. We both must serve the Undying One as His design foretells." {n}Kibellah hesitates. You see her eyebrow creeping upward before quickly straightening once more.{/n} "But if such is indeed your wish..."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は顎を上げる。{/n}「私を…理解する？どうして、ドミン・{name}？私の運命は初めから決まっている。私たちは、共に不死の者の思し召しに従い、主に仕えなければならない」{n}キベラは逡巡している。彼女は眉を寄せるが、すぐにまた元に戻す。{/n}「でも、それが本当にあなたの望みだというのなら…」

languages.text: {n}她仰起脸。{/n}“了解……我？这是为什么呢，秘者{name}？我的命运早已注定，我们的关系也早已注定。你我都必须侍奉不死之神，正如祂的旨意所要求的那样。”{n}绮贝菈犹豫片刻。你注意到她的眉毛皱了一下，随后又迅速恢复原本平直的样子。{/n}“不过，如果你真的这么希望的话……”
languages.original_text: {n}She raises her chin.{/n} "Understand... me? Why, Domin'{name}? My fate is preordained, and our places assigned. We both must serve the Undying One as His design foretells." {n}Kibellah hesitates. You see her eyebrow creeping upward before quickly straightening once more.{/n} "But if such is indeed your wish..."

traits.locale_text: {n}她仰起脸。{/n}“了解……我？这是为什么呢，秘者{name}？我的命运早已注定，我们的关系也早已注定。你我都必须侍奉不死之神，正如祂的旨意所要求的那样。”{n}绮贝菈犹豫片刻。你注意到她的眉毛皱了一下，随后又迅速恢复原本平直的样子。{/n}“不过，如果你真的这么希望的话……”

languages.text: {n}Sie hebt ihr Kinn.{/n} "Mich ... verstehen? Wozu, Domin'{name}? Mein Schicksal ist vorbestimmt, unsere Plätze sind uns zugewiesen. Wir müssen beide dem Todlosen so dienen, wie Sein Plan es vorsieht." {n}Kibellah zögert. Ihre Augenbraue geht nach oben, wird aber rasch wieder gerade.{/n} "Aber wenn Ihr es tatsächlich wünscht ..."
languages.original_text: {n}She raises her chin.{/n} "Understand... me? Why, Domin'{name}? My fate is preordained, and our places assigned. We both must serve the Undying One as His design foretells." {n}Kibellah hesitates. You see her eyebrow creeping upward before quickly straightening once more.{/n} "But if such is indeed your wish..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie hebt ihr Kinn.{/n} "Mich ... verstehen? Wozu, Domin'{name}? Mein Schicksal ist vorbestimmt, unsere Plätze sind uns zugewiesen. Wir müssen beide dem Todlosen so dienen, wie Sein Plan es vorsieht." {n}Kibellah zögert. Ihre Augenbraue geht nach oben, wird aber rasch wieder gerade.{/n} "Aber wenn Ihr es tatsächlich wünscht ..."

languages.text: {n}Elle lève le menton.{/n} « Me comprendre... moi ? À quoi bon, Domin'{name} ? Mon destin est prédéterminé, et nos places respectives arrêtées. Nous devons servir l'Immortel comme le prévoit Son grand dessein. » {n}Kibellah hésite et hausse brièvement les sourcils avant de retrouver son expression imperturbable.{/n} « Mais si tel est votre désir... »
languages.original_text: {n}She raises her chin.{/n} "Understand... me? Why, Domin'{name}? My fate is preordained, and our places assigned. We both must serve the Undying One as His design foretells." {n}Kibellah hesitates. You see her eyebrow creeping upward before quickly straightening once more.{/n} "But if such is indeed your wish..."

Nous devons servir l'Immortel comme le prévoit Son grand dessein. » {n}Kibellah hésite et hausse brièvement les sourcils avant de retrouver son expression imperturbable.{/n} « Mais si tel est votre désir... »

languages.original_text: {n}She raises her chin.{/n} "Understand... me? Why, Domin'? My fate is preordained, and our places assigned. We both must serve the Undying One as His design foretells." {n}Kibellah hesitates. You see her eyebrow creeping upward before quickly straightening once more.{/n} "But if such is indeed your wish..."

languages.text: {n}Çenesini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Anlamak mı... Beni mi? Peki neden Domin'{name}? Benim kaderim önceden belirlenmiş. Yerlerimiz tahsis edilmiş. İkimizin de Ölmeyen'e O'nun tasarımının öngördüğü şekilde hizmet etmemiz gerekiyor." {n}Kibellah tereddüt ediyor. Yeniden düzleşmeden önce kaşlarının yavaşça yukarı kalktığını görüyorsun.{/n} "Fakat arzun hakikaten de buysa..."
languages.original_text: {n}She raises her chin.{/n} "Understand... me? Why, Domin'{name}? My fate is preordained, and our places assigned. We both must serve the Undying One as His design foretells." {n}Kibellah hesitates. You see her eyebrow creeping upward before quickly straightening once more.{/n} "But if such is indeed your wish..."
